description: Configuration for different aesthetic style templates

camera_lens.name: Camera Lens
camera_lens.prompt: professional camera lens aesthetic, depth of field effect, bokeh background, sharp focus on subject, cinematic depth, DSLR quality, professional photography style, artistic blur

cinematic.name: Cinematic
cinematic.prompt: cinematic look, film grain, moody lighting, dramatic atmosphere, movie poster style, Hollywood aesthetic, color graded, professional film quality

classy.name: Classy
classy.prompt: classy and elegant aesthetic, sophisticated style, luxury fashion, refined appearance, high-end magazine quality, timeless elegance, polished look

creative.name: Creative
creative.prompt: creative artistic style, unique composition, artistic expression, innovative aesthetic, contemporary art influence, bold creative choices, artistic vision

daily.name: Daily
daily.prompt: casual daily life aesthetic, natural everyday look, candid style, relatable atmosphere, lifestyle photography, authentic moment, comfortable vibe

edgy.name: Edgy
edgy.prompt: edgy urban style, bold attitude, street fashion aesthetic, modern urban culture, confident look, contemporary edge, alternative style

editorial.name: Editorial
editorial.prompt: editorial fashion style, high fashion magazine quality, professional styling, Vogue aesthetic, runway inspired, model pose, fashion photography

funny.name: Funny
funny.prompt: fun and playful aesthetic, lighthearted mood, humorous style, entertaining vibe, cheerful atmosphere, joyful expression, comedic element

retro_vintage.name: Retro Vintage
retro_vintage.prompt: retro vintage aesthetic, nostalgic film look, classic vintage style, old school photography, aged photo quality, vintage color grading, throwback vibe

cool.name: The Cool One
cool.prompt: cool and confident aesthetic, effortlessly stylish, modern cool vibe, trendsetter look, charismatic presence, contemporary cool style

cute.name: The Cute One
cute.prompt: cute and adorable aesthetic, sweet charming style, gentle soft look, endearing appeal, kawaii inspired, lovely atmosphere, innocent charm

hot.name: The Hot One
hot.prompt: hot and attractive aesthetic, glamorous look, alluring style, captivating presence, sultry atmosphere, stunning appearance, striking beauty

vintage.name: Vintage
vintage.prompt: vintage aesthetic, classic timeless style, antique photo look, sepia toned, old photograph quality, historical vibe, vintage charm

y2k.name: Y2K
y2k.prompt: Y2K aesthetic, early 2000s style, millennium era fashion, nostalgic 2000s vibe, pop culture reference, cyber Y2K look, retro futuristic
